title: Trump Investigation & 2020 Elections
itunes:title: Trump Investigation & 2020 Elections
description:
Kevin discussed the Democrats investigation into President Donald Trump and the 2020 election with Richard Fowler, Nationally Syndicated Radio Show Host and Democratic political activist and Jason Miller, Former Senior Communications Advisor for the Trump campaign and former Communications Director for Trump transition, and Managing Director, Teneo Strategy.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
